channel.title: Ken Loach on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ken Loach on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Ken Loach Joins Edinburgh Film Festival Speaker Lineup Alongside Kevin Macdonald, Nia DaCosta
item.description: Loach will speak at the Scottish film festival with his long-time collaborators, writer Paul Laverty and producer Rebecca O’Brien, about their Palme d’Or-winning films.
